metadata.title: CVE-2014-2277 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The make_temporary_filename function in perltidy 20120701-1 and earlierallows local users to obtain sensitive information or write to arbitraryfiles via a symlink attack, related to use of the tmpnam function.

criterions.comment: perltidy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
